channel.title: Run Server Error! 317
channel.description:
Okay, Before I start, Silly me, Didn't back up the files. :palm:
Anywayyy; When I try to run my Server.Bat file I get the following message.
[code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ExceptionInInitializerError Caused by: java.jand.ArrayIndexOutOfboundsException: 17 at server.world.ItemHandler.loadItemList<ItemHandler.java:365> at server.world.ItemHandler.<init><ItemHandler.java:33> at server.Server.<clinit><Server.java:58>[/code]
Just unsure how to go about fixing this problem. :/ Any help would be great. :D

item.title: Run Server Error! 317
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“l33tmanl33t, post:3, topic:538731”]I have yeah, but I did change quite a few items.
Is there a way to pin point the item?[/quote]
The one with the most sets of numbers or least would be the issue. So, uh, start counting?

Read full topic

item.title: Run Server Error! 317
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

You must have recently been editing your item.cfg as the error is saying you have too many or too little numbers for one of your items. Seeing as it says 17, I’m going with too many.

Read full topic
